subject: Fwd: Order #SSN4034 confirmed

This has not shipped yet, could you provide an update please?

I would like to instead order the new Simsonn HS Pro Shifter.

Thank you!

Shaun

conversations.body_text: Hi Shaun Cimini,    We apologize for the inconvenience. Your order has been shipped. Here is your tracking link. We regret that we were unable to update you promptly.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047100352246

Hi!

I am still tracking and it is showing an error and still shows as in China
with no movement for a few days now. Would you be able to check with the
carrier to see why this is taking so long to ship? I am hoping it is not
lost.

Thank you!

Shaun


On Tue, Dec 9, 2025 at 5:11 AM service@simsonn.com

Hello,

As the package is still in China and will likely take weeks to arrive
still, can I send this back for a refund and purchase the newer Simsonn
shifter? Would that arrive quicker? I also ordered pedals from you and
those shipped very quick, but I am disappointed on the shipping time for
this shifter.

Thank you,

Shaun


On Tue, Dec 16, 2025 at 10:36 AM Shaun Cimini <shaun.cimini@gmail.com>
wrote:

> Hi!
>
> I am still tracking and it is showing an error and still shows as in China
> with no movement for a few days now. Would you be able to check with the
> carrier to see why this is taking so long to ship? I am hoping it is not
> lost.
>
> Thank you!
>
> Shaun
>
>
> On Tue, Dec 9, 2025 at 5:11 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Shaun Cimini,    I apologize for not getting back to you sooner. I see your package should arrive within the next couple of days.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047100352246
